mapper.insert: insert into stableinfo (id, idName, register, memo, peopleNum, registTime, startTime, is_delete, idnameteamnum) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{register,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{peoplenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idnameteamnum,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update stableinfo set idName = #{idname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register = #{register,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, peopleNum = #{peoplenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, registTime = #{registtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, startTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, idnameteamnum = #{idnameteamnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, idName, register, memo, peopleNum, registTime, startTime, is_delete, idnameteamnum from stableinfo where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, idName, register, memo, peopleNum, registTime, startTime, is_delete, idnameteamnum from stableinfo
select id, idName, register, memo, peopleNum, registTime, startTime, is_delete, idnameteamnum from stableinfo where idName = #{idname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by idnameteamnum desc
select distinct idName from stableinfo ORDER BY idName ASC
